header.title: Initial Account Setup
header.description: Follow these steps to get your account ready and start receiving bookings from your clients. From the appointment schedule, you'll be able to manage your appointments simply and quickly, organize your team and optimize your service.

usage.ready_message: Ready! Your online booking system is up and running. üéâ

profile.title: Complete Your Public Profile
profile.url_description: This will be the address you share with your clients.
profile.url_note: Use only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens
profile.title_description: The name your clients will see.
profile.bio_description: Tell briefly about your business, featured services, years of experience.
profile.images_description: Add an attractive cover photo of your salon or work, and your logo or representative image.
profile.customization_description: Choose colors that represent your brand and select the design style you like best.
profile.tip: A complete profile generates more trust in your clients.

services.title: Create Your Services
services.duration_description: How long does it take you to perform this service?
services.duration_note: This is important for the system to calculate available times
services.price_description: The cost you charge for this service.
services.description_example: Example: "Personalized cut with wash, dry and styling included"
services.photo_description: An image showing the service result.
services.tip: Create all the services you offer. You can edit them or add more later.

hours.title: Configure Your Business Hours
hours.schedule_description: Define the schedule for each day.
hours.schedule_example: Example: Monday to Friday 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Saturdays 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM
hours.split_description: If you close at noon, you can configure two periods.
hours.tip: Only available appointments within these hours will be shown.

team.title: Add Your Team
team.basic_description: Full name, email, phone and photo (optional).
team.assign_description: Select which services this employee can perform.
team.assign_example: Example: Mary can do "Cut" and "Coloring", but not "Manicure"
team.schedule_description: Define which days and hours each employee works. They can be different from the general business hours.
team.note: When adding an employee, the system sends you an email with a link so the employee can confirm their account. Once confirmed, they can log in and manage their own appointments, without viewing private information such as your public profile, services, business income, etc.
team.important: If you work alone, you must create yourself as an employee so the system can assign bookings correctly.
